dashboard.tagline: Your intelligent research and writing companion.

startResearch.title: Start Research
startResearch.description: Begin a new AI-powered research project

startWriting.title: Start Writing
startWriting.description: Create and edit documents with AI assistance

manageDocuments.title: Manage Documents
manageDocuments.description: Organize and access your research materials

profileSettings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
profileSettings.changePasswordDescription: Update your account password for security.

aiSettings.advancedConfigurationDescription: Enable advanced mode to configure separate providers and credentials for each model type.
aiSettings.advancedModeDescription: Configure individual providers and API keys for each model type
aiSettings.providerConfigurationDescription: Configure your AI provider and API credentials for model access.
aiSettings.openRouterDescription: Access to 100+ models including GPT-4, Claude, and more.
aiSettings.openAiDescription: Direct access to OpenAI models like GPT-4 and GPT-3.5.
aiSettings.modelSelectionDescription: Select models for different agent types. Available models are fetched from your enabled provider.
aiSettings.selectProviderToConfigure: Please select an AI provider to configure models.
aiSettings.advancedModelConfigurationDescription: Configure separate providers, API keys, and models for each agent type.

searchSettings.providerConfigurationDescription: Configure your search provider for web research capabilities.
searchSettings.tavilyDescription: AI-powered search with real-time web data and citations.
searchSettings.linkupDescription: Real-time search API with comprehensive web coverage.
searchSettings.jinaDescription: AI-powered search and web page reading with advanced extraction capabilities.
searchSettings.jinaFreeTier: Free tier available with rate limits.
searchSettings.searxngDescription: Open-source metasearch engine that aggregates results from multiple search engines.
searchSettings.selectCategoriesDescription: Select one or more categories for search results:
searchSettings.searxngInstanceUrl: Enter the URL of your SearXNG instance. You can use a public instance or
searchSettings.searxngNote: Note: Your SearXNG instance must be configured to output JSON format.
searchSettings.searchConfigurationDescription: Configure search behavior and parameters for {{provider}}.
searchSettings.maxSearchResultsDescriptionTavily: Number of search results to return per query (1-20). Higher values may increase API costs.
searchSettings.maxSearchResultsDescriptionJina: Number of search results to return per query (1-10).
searchSettings.maxSearchResultsDescriptionSearxng: Number of search results to return per query (1-20).
searchSettings.tavilySearchDepthDescription: Advanced search provides more comprehensive results but costs 2x API credits.
searchSettings.linkupSearchDepthDescription: Deep search uses an agentic workflow for more comprehensive results but takes longer.
searchSettings.readFullContentDescription: Visit every URL in search results and return full content using Reader. This provides more comprehensive information but takes longer.
searchSettings.fetchFaviconsDescription: Include website favicons in search results for better visual identification.
searchSettings.bypassCacheDescription: Ignore cached results and fetch fresh content directly. Useful for time-sensitive searches.
searchSettings.searxngConfigurationDescription: Configure search parameters for your SearXNG instance.
searchSettings.searxngNoApiCosts: SearXNG aggregates results from multiple search engines. No API costs involved.

webFetchSettings.title: Web Page Fetching Configuration
webFetchSettings.description: Configure how web pages are fetched and processed for research.
webFetchSettings.originalDescription: Built-in web page fetcher using newspaper3k and PyMuPDF for content extraction.
webFetchSettings.jinaDescription: Jina Reader API (r.jina.ai) provides advanced web page reading with browser rendering.
webFetchSettings.jinaApiKeyNote: Uses the same API key configured in Search settings. Free tier available with rate limits.
webFetchSettings.fallbackDescription: Uses the built-in fetcher first, automatically falling back to Jina Reader API if the site blocks access.
webFetchSettings.fallbackFeature1: Best of both worlds - fast local fetching when possible
webFetchSettings.fallbackFeature2: Automatic fallback for sites that block scrapers (403 errors)
webFetchSettings.fallbackFeature3: Uses Jina settings configured below when fallback is triggered
webFetchSettings.fallbackFeature4: Requires Jina API key for fallback functionality
webFetchSettings.jinaConfigurationDescription: Configure advanced options for Jina Reader API.
webFetchSettings.browserEngineDescription: Browser engine affects quality, speed, and completeness of content extraction.
webFetchSettings.timeoutDescription: Maximum page load wait time (5-60 seconds).
webFetchSettings.gatherLinks: Gather all links at the end
webFetchSettings.gatherImages: Gather all images at the end

researchSettings.title: Research Parameters
researchSettings.description: Configure default values for research parameters. These can be overridden per mission.
researchSettings.quickPresetsDescription: Apply pre-configured settings for common use cases
researchSettings.aiPoweredConfigurationDescription: Let an AI agent dynamically optimize parameters based on your request.
researchSettings.skipFinalReplanningDescription: Skip final replanning for faster completion
researchSettings.writingModeSearchSettingsDescription: Configure search behavior for Writing mode

adminSettings.deleteUserConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
adminSettings.userManagementDescription: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions
adminSettings.enableRegistrationDescription: Allow new users to register accounts
adminSettings.dbConsistencyCheckDescription: Check for inconsistencies in document storage across the database, vector store, and file system. This will identify orphaned files, missing data, and synchronization issues.

register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
register.title: Register for MAESTRO
register.subtitle: Create your account to get started.
register.createAccountSubtext: Enter your details below to create your account.

login.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
login.title: Welcome to MAESTRO
login.subtitle: Sign in to your intelligent research and writing companion.
login.signInSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.

chat.noInformationSourceDescription: Please enable web search or select a document group before sending your message.
chat.errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your message.
chat.genericError: Sorry, I encountered an error while processing your message. Please try again.
chat.serviceUnavailable: The AI service is currently unavailable. Please try again in a moment.
chat.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page and log in again.
chat.connectionError: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
chat.researchMissionStartedDescription: I've created a new research mission. Check the research panel to monitor progress.
chat.actionErrorDescription: There was an error processing the agent action. Please try again.
chat.questionsGeneratedDescription: I've generated initial research questions. You can review them in the research panel.
chat.refiningQuestionsDescription: I'm updating the research questions based on your feedback.
chat.researchStartedDescription: Great! I'm starting the research process now. Monitor progress in the research panel.
chat.loadingChatDescription: Please wait while we load your conversation...
chat.welcomeDescription: AI research assistant ready to help with analysis and insights.
chat.readyToHelpDescription: Ask questions, request analysis, or start a research mission.
chat.missionCompletedDescription: View the results in the Research Panel. Additional features coming soon.
chat.missionFailedDescription: Please review the error logs and try again with a new mission.
chat.missionStoppedDescription: The mission was manually stopped. You can resume it from the Research Panel.
chat.typeMessage: Type your message or research request...
chat.informationSourceWarning: At least one information source must be enabled
chat.keyPressHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

chatHistory.deleteChatConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? All messages and conversation history will be permanently removed.

documentBrowser.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, author, or filename...
documentBrowser.author: Author

documentView.noContent: No content available for this document
documentView.noContentDescription: The document may still be processing or an error occurred during processing

documentGroupSidebar.deleteFolderConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? This will not delete the documents themselves, only the folder organization.

uploadProgressModal.title: Upload Progress
uploadProgressModal.someFailed: {{count}} upload(s) failed. You can retry them above.

documentFilters.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, author, or filename...
documentFilters.author: Author

enhancedDocumentList.failedToAdd: Failed to add documents to group
enhancedDocumentList.failedToRemove: Failed to remove documents from group
enhancedDocumentList.supportedFiles: Supports PDF, Word (docx/doc), and Markdown (md) files
enhancedDocumentList.unsupportedFiles: Unsupported file types. Supported: PDF, Word (docx/doc), Markdown (md/markdown)
enhancedDocumentList.dragAndDropOrBrowse: Drag and drop files here or use "Browse & Add" to get started.
enhancedDocumentList.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here to upload to your library.
enhancedDocumentList.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search terms or filters.
enhancedDocumentList.deleteConfirmation_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} document? This action cannot be undone.
enhancedDocumentList.deleteConfirmation_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} documents? This action cannot be undone.

missionSettingsDialog.title: Mission Settings
missionSettingsDialog.missionSpecificSettingsDescription: These settings will override your user defaults for this mission only. Leave fields empty to use your default settings. Blue-highlighted fields have mission-specific overrides.
missionSettingsDialog.skipFinalReplanningDescription: Skip final outline refinement for faster completion

researchPanel.failedToFetchLogs: Failed to fetch initial mission logs:
researchPanel.missionStartedSuccess: The research mission has been started successfully.
researchPanel.startFailedDescription: Failed to start the mission. Please try again.
researchPanel.missionStoppedSuccess: The research mission has been stopped successfully.
researchPanel.stopFailedDescription: Failed to stop the mission. Please try again.
researchPanel.missionResumedSuccess: The research mission has been resumed successfully.
researchPanel.resumeFailedDescription: Failed to resume the mission. Please try again.
researchPanel.noActiveMissionDescription: Start a research conversation in the chat to see mission progress, plans, notes, and drafts here.
researchPanel.askToResearch: Ask me to research a topic to get started

notesTab.notesExportedSuccess: Research notes have been exported successfully.
notesTab.title: Research Notes
notesTab.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
notesTab.notesAppearHere: Research notes will appear here as the mission progresses.
notesTab.startMission: Start a research mission to see notes here.
